Element.Name: BAND
Element.Description: This Data Pool holds the value of the current station band

Element.Name: NAME
Element.Description: This DataPool holds the current station name

Element.Name: FREQVAL
Element.Description: This DataPool holds the current frequency value

Element.Name: BANDLEVEL
Element.Description: This DataPool holds the current band level

Element.Name: FLAG
Element.Description: is true if a PS is available

Element.Name: CurrentStationListIndex
Element.Description: stores the current Index of the actual station when in StationList

Element.Name: HD_INFO_BITS
Element.Description: Datapool to store the HD station info bits

Element.Name: ACTIVE_HD_AUD_PRGM
Element.Description: Datapool to store the active HD audio program number

Element.Name: AVAIL_HD_AUDPRGMS
Element.Description: Datapool to store available HD Audio programs

Element.Name: MODE
Element.Description: This DataPool holds the diferent modes of tuner( SCAN,NORMAL,etc)

Element.Name: FEATURE_PSNAME
Element.Description: It indicates the current program station name

Element.Name: HIGHCUT
Element.Description: Indicates whether Hicut is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: TESTMODE
Element.Description: Indicates whether the test mode is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: SHARX
Element.Description: Indicates whether Sharx is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: FMSTEP
Element.Description: Indicates whether FMSTEP is enabled or disabled

Element.Name: TA
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate whether TA is ON/OFF

Element.Name: AF
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate whether AF is ON/OFF

Element.Name: REG
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate whether REG is ON/OFF

Element.Name: REG_AUTO
Element.Description: Regional auto ON nd OFF(this is for test mode)

Element.Name: SHARX_LEVEL
Element.Description: for Engg mode sharx setting values

Element.Name: FIELDSTRENGTH
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of FIELDSTRENGTH

Element.Name: MULTIPATH
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of MULTIPATH

Element.Name: NEIGHBOUR
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of adjacent channel interference

Element.Name: RDSQUALITY
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of RDSQUALITY

Element.Name: AFLISTLENGTH
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of AFLISTLENGTH

Element.Name: TMCCOUNT
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of TMCCOUNT

Element.Name: HICUT
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of HICUT

Element.Name: SHARX
Element.Description: This Data Pool is used to indicate the value of SHARX

Element.Name: DUMMY
Element.Description: DUMMY TO TRIGGER MONITOR SCREEN UPDATE IN DTSM

Element.Name: CALL_SIGN
Element.Description: This DP is used to indicate HD Call sign on the station

Element.Name: STATUS
Element.Description: This DP is used to indicate Active TA on the station

Element.Name: PLAYING
Element.Description: This DP is used to indicate Active TA being really played, as it can be stopped by the user

Element.Name: STATICLIST
Element.Description: structure to hold the preset freq/name

Element.Name: ELEMENT1_FLAG
Element.Description: Indicates whether preset element holds the station name or frequency

Element.Name: ELEMENT2_PSNAME
Element.Description: Holds PSName of second preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT2_FREQ
Element.Description: Holds the freequency of second preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT2_FLAG
Element.Description: Indicates whether preset element holds the station name or frequency

Element.Name: ELEMENT3_PSNAME
Element.Description: Holds PSName of third preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT3_FREQ
Element.Description: Holds Freq of third preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT3_FLAG
Element.Description: Indicates whether preset element holds the station name or frequency

Element.Name: ELEMENT4_PSNAME
Element.Description: Holds PSName of fourth preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT4_FREQ
Element.Description: Holds freq of fourth preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT4_FLAG
Element.Description: Indicates whether preset element holds the station name or frequency

Element.Name: ELEMENT5_PSNAME
Element.Description: Holds PSName of FIFTH preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT5_FREQ
Element.Description: Holds FREQ of FIFTH preset button

Element.Name: ELEMENT5_FLAG
Element.Description: Indicates whether preset element holds the station name or frequency

Element.Name: UPDATED
Element.Description: as soon as all presets are updated this datapool is made true

Element.Name: LIST
Element.Description: HOLDS ALL THE DATAPOOLS IDS RELATED TO FMLIST

Element.Name: TOTALELEMENTS
Element.Description: holds total number of elements in FMList

Element.Name: LISTUPDATE
Element.Description: indicates wheather the list is updated or not

Element.Name: ELEMENTINDEX
Element.Description: indicates which button has been pressed

Element.Name: ELEM1_TPSTATUS
Element.Description: Indicates the TP status of first element

Element.Name: SELECTED_INDEX
Element.Description: Indicates which list element has been selected by the user

Element.Name: RDS
Element.Description: keeps the elements: RadioText;RadioTextState for DAB and FM

Element.Name: FM_RadioText
Element.Description: keeps the string for FM RadioText (max 64 characters)

Element.Name: FM_RadioTextState
Element.Description: Value = 0, Meaning = waiting for radio text Value = 1, Meaning = radio text available

Element.Name: SEEKMODE
Element.Description: Seek in stationlist or presetlist, deafult is stationlist (0)

Element.Name: DAB_SERVICEINFO
Element.Description: the entries of the information received with message FID_DAB_G_ACTIVE_SERVICE_INFO will be stored here

Element.Name: ServiceLabel
Element.Description: saves the string of the current service

Element.Name: TMC_LAST_MSG_TIME_HOUR
Element.Description: Holds Hour value of Last TMC Message

Element.Name: TMC_LAST_MSG_TIME_MIN
Element.Description: Holds Minute value of Last TMC Message

Element.Name: TMC_LAST_MSG_DATE_YEAR
Element.Description: Holds year value of last TMC Message

Element.Name: TMC_LAST_MSG_DATE_MONTH
Element.Description: Holds month value of last TMC message.

Element.Name: TMC_LAST_MSG_DATE_DAY
Element.Description: Holds day value of Last TMC message

Element.Name: FMLISTCOUNT
Element.Description: nr of items in the fm station list

Element.Name: MSG__TUNER_DATA
Element.Description: to store infos sent via FID_G_TUNER_DATA

Element.Name: BAND
Element.Description: the band-info will be stored here

Element.Name: ACTIVE_LIST
Element.Description: Indicates the active list in radio gui. 0 = presetlist, 1 = fm stationlist, 2 = fm stationlist is diaplayed

Element.Name: FOR_XML
Element.Description: entries that are saved for XML

Element.Name: RADIO_Selection_MODE
Element.Description: stores the last selection mode for Next/Prev

Element.Name: RADIO_ACTIVE_STATION_PS
Element.Description: keeps the PS name of the current station in manual mode

Element.Name: RADIO_CURRENT_TA_STATION_NAME
Element.Description: keeps the current TA Station Name

Element.Name: RADIO_TEXT_MODE
Element.Description: saves the last RadioTextMode from XML

Element.Name: RADIO_CHANGED_PRESET_CONTENT
Element.Description: the content of the current preset has been changed

Element.Name: TP_SEEK
Element.Description: Holds the status of tp seek, active or not

Element.Name: CLUSTER_NEW_LIST
Element.Description: Notification for cluster new station list available

Element.Name: CURRENT_BANK
Element.Description: To store the current Bank information FM1, FM2, AM

ListElement.Name: AM_STATIONLIST
ListElement.Description: Datapool list to hold AM Station list

Column.Name: STATION_NAME
Column.Description: Datapool to store the Station name

Column.Name: HD_PRGM_NO
Column.Description: Datapool to store the HD Program no

Column.Name: PRESET_NO
Column.Description: Datapool to store the AM Preset no

Element.Name: AM_STATIONLIST_COUNT
Element.Description: Datapool for storing AM station list count

Element.Name: CURRENT_AM_STATIONLIST_INDEX
Element.Description: Datapool to store list index of active station for AM list

Element.Name: FM_PRESET_LIST_HD_STATUS
Element.Description: Holds HD status of the FM preset list elements from middleware. Bitwise

Element.Name: AM_PRESET_LIST_HD_STATUS
Element.Description: Holds HD status of the AM preset list elements from middleware

Element.Name: HD_PSD
Element.Description: Datapool to store the PSD information

Element.Name: ARTIST
Element.Description: Datapool to store the Artist name
